project.description: This Job checks LL and RFA250 failures scanning all the testsuites for a given team name. If flagged, the job will also run a check in the MT DDP sites looking for VCS events related to a list of services (owned by DespicableUs team).

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Team_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Your team name used to retrieve the test-suites.

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: Distribution_list
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: Distributin list to notify the failures to.
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue: andrea.parodi@ericsson.com mara.medico@ericsson.com filippo.gallo@ericsson.com giampiero.torrielli@ericsson.com laura.bregante@ericsson.com mariaantonia.vaccarello@ericsson.com lucia.spoglianti@ericsson.com paola.zerega@ericsson.com

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Check_type
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Choose which tests result to check.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: Run_vcs_checks
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If flagged this job will run the VCS checks (monitor-offline and clean-start) in MT DDPs related to DespicableUs services (accesscontrol, sps, vaultserv)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: user_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Your username to access DDP site.

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: passw
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: Your password to access DDP site.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: Cleanup_files
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Select if you only want to remove the old files from workspace without checking the failures. All the above fields excluding Team_name will be ignored.

hudson.plugins.python.Python.command:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*- import json import subprocess import os.path from os import path import datetime import time import requests import sys import os import urllib3 urllib3.disable_warnings(urllib3.exceptions.InsecureRequestWarning)
##################### ENVIRONMENT LOAD #################################### un = os.environ['user_name'] pw = os.environ['passw'] team_name = os.environ['Team_name'] check_type = os.environ['Check_type'] cleanup_old_f = eval(os.environ['Cleanup_files'].capitalize()) run_vcs_checks = eval(os.environ['Run_vcs_checks'].capitalize())
###########################LL and RFA250 check variables ############################ host = 'mtportal.seli.wh.rnd.internal.ericsson.com'
drop = "" iso = "" iso_from = "" iso_to = "" suite = "" to_be_sent = False
########################### VCS event finder variables ###################
ses = requests.Session() events_file_name = "vcs_events_file" vcs_message_file_name = 'notified_VCS_EVENTS.txt' report_file_name = '{}-VCStmp_message.txt'.format(team_name) total_counter = 0 vcs_message = '''''' vcs_to_be_sent = False login_URL = 'php/common/loginPage.php?location=%2Fphp%2Fsite_index.php'
yesterday = datetime.date.today() - datetime.timedelta(days=1) dir = yesterday.strftime('%d%m%y')
#ENM sites list with relevant base urls ENMd = {'LMI_ENM296': 'https://ddpenm7.athtem.eei.ericsson.se/', 'LMI_ENM416': 'https://ddpi.athtem.eei.ericsson.se/', 'LMI_ENM664': 'https://ddpi.athtem.eei.ericsson.se/', 'LMI_ENM244': 'https://ddpenm6.athtem.eei.ericsson.se/', 'LMI_ENM636': 'https://ddpenm5.athtem.eei.ericsson.se/', 'LMI_ENM1077' : 'https://ddpi.athtem.eei.ericsson.se/'}
#Data structure for the events record events = {} for el in ENMd.keys(): events[el] = {} events[el]['accesscontrol'] = {} events[el]['accesscontrol']['MonitorOffline']=[] events[el]['accesscontrol']['CleanStart']=[] events[el]['sps'] = {} events[el]['sps']['MonitorOffline']=[] events[el]['sps']['CleanStart']=[] events[el]['vaultserv'] = {} events[el]['vaultserv']['MonitorOffline'] = [] events[el]['vaultserv']['CleanStart'] = []
###########################LL and RFA250 check ############################
def execute_command(command): command_array = command.split(" ") process = subprocess.Popen(command_array, stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.PIPE) output = process.communicate()[0] return output
def retrieveDrop(is_ll): global drop get_url = "https://{}/metrics-services/sprint-details-from?sprint=19.01".format(host)
output_json = ses.get(get_url, verify=False) dati = json.loads(output_json.content) if len(dati) == 0: print("No DROP available, exiting.") exit(0) if is_ll: drop = dati[0]['name'] else: for i in range(2): drop += dati[i]['name'] + "," drop = drop[:-1] print("Checking drop : {}".format(drop))
def retrieveIso(is_ll): global drop global iso_from global iso_to global iso job_type = '' if not is_ll: job_type = '-failreport'
get_url = "https://{}/metrics-services/list-iso-versions{}?drop={}".format(host,job_type,drop) output_json = ses.get(get_url, verify=False) dati = json.loads(output_json.content) if len(dati) == 0: print("No ISO available, we are likely on a sprint change, exiting.") return False if is_ll: #get the first and last isos iso_from_temp = dati[0]['value'].strip() iso_to = dati[-1]['value'].strip() if iso_from_temp[0] != iso_to[0]: for i in dati: if i['value'][0] == iso_to[0]: iso_from_temp = i['value'].strip() break iso_from = iso_from_temp print("Checking ISOs: from {} to {}".format(iso_from, iso_to)) else: # get the last 20 isos GREEN dati_filtered = [] for elem in dati: if elem['baseLine'] == "SUCCESS": dati_filtered.append(elem) for i in dati_filtered[-20:]: iso += i['value'].strip() + "," iso = iso[:-1] print("Checking ISOs: {}".format(iso)) return True
def retrieveSuite(is_ll): global suite job_type = 'longloop-suite-names' if not is_ll: job_type = 'rfa-suite-names' get_url = "https://{}/metrics-services/{}".format(host,job_type) output_json = ses.get(get_url, verify=False) dati = json.loads(output_json.content) for element in dati: if sys.version_info[0] == 3: new_suite = element['value'].replace('\xe2\x80\x93', '-') # this is to replace long dash character in some suite name. else : new_suite = element['value'].encode('utf8').replace('\xe2\x80\x93', '-') # this is to replace long dash character in some suite name. suite+=new_suite + "*" suite = suite[:-1]
def cleanup(tmp_message_file_name): if path.exists(tmp_message_file_name): os.remove(tmp_message_file_name) print('Found and removed {}'.format(tmp_message_file_name))
def save_new_failures(tmp_message_file_name, mail_sent_file, message_file): global to_be_sent if path.exists(tmp_message_file_name) and os.stat(tmp_message_file_name).st_size != 0: kind = 'LL' if 'LL' in tmp_message_file_name else 'RFA250' print("{} Failures will be notified.".format(kind)) with open(mail_sent_file, "a") as mail_file: mail_file.write(datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') + " send mail\n") to_be_sent = True # the failures are added in the message file to trace the history, temporary file is attached to the email. with open(tmp_message_file_name, "r") as tmp_message_file: message_file.write(tmp_message_file.read())
def reset_variables(): global drop global iso global suite global iso_from global iso_to drop = "" iso = "" suite = "" iso_from = "" iso_to = ""
def cleanup_old_files(): files = os.listdir(os.getcwd()) for el in files: if el.startswith(team_name): print("Removing {}".format(el)) os.remove(el)
def execute_ll(): print("Running LL failures check for team {}".format(team_name)) reset_variables() message_file_name = '{}-LLmessage.txt'.format(team_name) tmp_message_file_name = '{}-LLtmp_message.txt'.format(team_name) mail_sent_file = '{}-LLcheckScriptFailure'.format(team_name) cleanup(tmp_message_file_name) message_file = open(message_file_name, "a+")
signaledFailures = [] if path.exists(message_file_name): signaledFailures = message_file.read().splitlines() print("LL already signalled failures size: {}".format(len(signaledFailures))) retrieveDrop(True) if not retrieveIso(True): return retrieveSuite(True)
post_url = "https://{}/metrics-services/long-loop-trends-by-teams".format(host) body= {} body['drop']= drop body['iso_from']= iso_from body['iso_to']= iso_to body['suite']= suite
output_json = ses.post(post_url, json=body, verify=False) dati = json.loads(output_json.content)
# looking for failures in the response for iso_el in dati: base = iso_el['trendsByTeamIsoVOs'] version = iso_el['isoVersion'].strip() for x in base: if team_name in x['suiteName']: if x['testPassed'] != x['testTotal']: stringa = version + " " + x['suiteName'] + "\n" if stringa.strip() not in signaledFailures: with open(tmp_message_file_name, "a") as tmp_message_file: tmp_message_file.write(stringa)
# new failures are notified, if any save_new_failures(tmp_message_file_name, mail_sent_file, message_file) message_file.close()
def execute_rfa(): print("Running RFA250 failures check for team {}".format(team_name)) reset_variables() global iso message_file_name = '{}-RFAmessage.txt'.format(team_name) tmp_message_file_name = '{}-RFAtmp_message.txt'.format(team_name) mail_sent_file = '{}-RFAcheckScriptFailure'.format(team_name) cleanup(tmp_message_file_name)
retrieveDrop(False) if not retrieveIso(False): return retrieveSuite(False) message_file = open(message_file_name, "a+")
signaledFailures = [] if path.exists(message_file_name): signaledFailures = message_file.read().splitlines() print("RFA already signalled failures size: {}".format(len(signaledFailures))) post_url = "https://{}/metrics-services/rfa-trends-by-teams-failreport".format(host) body={} body['drop'] = drop body['isos'] = iso body['suites'] = suite body['isoStatus'] = "Working ISO" output_json = ses.post(post_url, json=body, verify=False) dati = json.loads(output_json.content)
post_url_jira = "https://{}/metrics-services/rfa-trends-jira-tickets".format(host)
# looking for failures in the response for iso_el in dati: base = iso_el['trendsByTeamIsoVOs'] version = iso_el['isoVersion'].strip() for x in base: if team_name in x['suiteName']: if x['testPassed'] != x['testTotal']: body_jira = {} body_jira['iso'] = version body_jira['rfa250_testcase'] = x['suiteName'] body_jira['jira_ticket'] = 1111 output_json = ses.post(post_url_jira, json=body_jira, verify=False) jira_results = json.loads(output_json.content)
# only failures without a TORF associated should be collected if 'Enter Jira Ticket Number' in jira_results[0]['jira']: stringa = version + " " + x['suiteName'] + "\n" if stringa.strip() not in signaledFailures: with open(tmp_message_file_name, "a") as tmp_message_file: tmp_message_file.write(stringa) # new failures are notified by email, if any save_new_failures(tmp_message_file_name, mail_sent_file, message_file) message_file.close()
############################################ VCS event finder ################################
def retrieve_events(): with open(events_file_name, 'w') as f: for enm in ENMd.keys(): login_url = '' try: #Retrieve login url from site vcs_url = ENMd[enm] + 'php/TOR/vcs_events.php?site=' + enm + '&dir=' + dir + '&date=' + str(yesterday) + '&oss=tor' outp = ses.get(vcs_url, verify=False) login_url = outp.url except: print("Some issue happened during the VCS event login process, mainly due to connection errors") exit(1)
#Login and open the ddp page vcs_events = ses.post(login_url, data={'login': un.strip(), 'password': pw.strip()}, verify=False) decoded_vcs_events = vcs_events.content if sys.version_info[0] == 3: decoded_vcs_events = vcs_events.content.decode()
if "Invalid SIGNUM and password." in decoded_vcs_events: print("Password validation failed, exiting.") f.write("Password validation failed, exiting.\n") exit(1) #decoded = vcs_events.content.decode()
f.write('ENMSERVER:' + enm + '\n') for line in (decoded_vcs_events).splitlines(): if " time:" in line: f.write(line + '\n')
def search_for_services(): global vcs_to_be_sent global total_counter with open(events_file_name, 'r') as f: for line in f: if 'ENMSERVER:' in line: current_server = line.split(":")[1].strip() #print("current server:",current_server) if "CleanStart" in line: if "accesscontrol" in line: vcs_to_be_sent = True total_counter += 1 events[current_server]['accesscontrol']['CleanStart'].append(line) elif "sps" in line: vcs_to_be_sent = True total_counter += 1 events[current_server]['sps']['CleanStart'].append(line) elif "vaultserv" in line: vcs_to_be_sent = True total_counter += 1 events[current_server]['vaultserv']['CleanStart'].append(line) elif "MonitorOffline" in line: if "accesscontrol" in line: vcs_to_be_sent = True total_counter += 1 events[current_server]['accesscontrol']['MonitorOffline'].append(line) elif "sps" in line: vcs_to_be_sent = True total_counter += 1 events[current_server]['sps']['MonitorOffline'].append(line) elif "vaultserv" in line: vcs_to_be_sent = True total_counter += 1 events[current_server]['vaultserv']['MonitorOffline'].append(line)
def build_message(): global vcs_message vcs_message = '''''' for server in events.keys(): vcs_message += '''\n{} \t {}\t{}php/TOR/vcs_events.php?site={}&dir={}&date={}&oss=tor SERVICE\t\tCLEANSTART\tMONITOR OFFLINE cacs\t\t{}\t\t\t{} sps \t\t{}\t\t\t{} vault\t\t{}\t\t\t{} '''.format(server, yesterday, ENMd[server],server,dir,yesterday, len(events[server]['accesscontrol']['CleanStart']), len(events[server]['accesscontrol']['MonitorOffline']), len(events[server]['sps']['CleanStart']), len(events[server]['sps']['MonitorOffline']), len(events[server]['vaultserv']['CleanStart']), len(events[server]['vaultserv']['MonitorOffline']))
with open(report_file_name, 'w') as report: report.write(vcs_message)
def generate_report(): if vcs_to_be_sent: print("Found vcs event in DDP sites.") with open(vcs_message_file_name, "a+") as f: f.seek(0) actual = f.readlines() print(actual) if str(yesterday) + '-' + str(total_counter) in actual: print("failures already notified, nothing to do") # exit(0) else: print("Failures will be notified") f.seek(0) f.truncate() f.write(str(yesterday) + '-' + str(total_counter)) # exit(1) else: print("No issue found.") #exit(1)#this is just for test, to be removed os.remove(events_file_name)
########################### MAIN ####################################
if cleanup_old_f: cleanup_old_files() run_vcs_checks = False
else: if 'LongLoopOnly' in check_type: execute_ll() elif 'RFA250Only' in check_type: execute_rfa() else: execute_ll() execute_rfa() # to_be_sent = True
mail_message = "There are failures in: "
if run_vcs_checks: print("Executing VCS checks") retrieve_events() search_for_services() build_message() print(vcs_message) generate_report() # vcs_to_be_sent = True
if to_be_sent: mail_message += "RFA or LL ," # se fallisce LL o RFA c'Ã¨ il file tmp da allegare. if vcs_to_be_sent: mail_message += "VCS events in DDP " # if no vcs failure, remove the report file. else: if path.exists(report_file_name): os.remove(report_file_name)
# Build mail subject message. with open ("despicable.properties", "w") as f: f.write("Subject_message=" + mail_message[:-1])

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:
The attached file contains the $Team_name failures.
$DEFAULT_CONTENT
